This is what I got a chat ban. Corki was inting mmiddle. Corki blamed the jg not ganking.
COME ON YOU CALL THIS TOXIC! Heck last night I had someone int and not say anything at all. THEY ARE STILL PLAYING THE GAME AND STILL INTING EVERY GAME. 
But I get a chat ban. What is the damn point of chat in this damn game if you cannot say things. Really...

It is the social aspect of the game? Not just for " Hey middle is mia. " so why are you baning PEOPLE FOR ONE BLOODY GAME!!!!!!!!
Why because i said MORON.. Frag. I guess I do what everyone else does then and say they are AUTISTIC is that word better? 
I think not.
So come on for once. THIS IS 15+ not 10 year olds running about crying because of the MAGIC KEY WORDS!
